def plot_confusion_matrix(y, y_pred):
    acc = round(accuracy_score(y, y_pred), 2)
    cm = confusion_matrix(y, y_pred)
    sns.heatmap(cm, annot=True, fmt=".0f")
    plt.xlabel('y_pred')
    plt.ylabel('y')
    plt.title('Accuracy Score: {0}'.format(acc), size=10)
    plt.show()
